plants.name: Aloe Vera
plants.description: A succulent plant known for its thick, fleshy leaves.
plants.uses: Used topically for burns, cuts, and skin hydration.

plants.name: Amla

plants.name: Ashoka
plants.description: A sacred tree with bright orange flowers.

plants.name: Ashwagandha
plants.description: An adaptogenic herb that helps the body cope with stress.

plants.name: Avocado
